channel.title: Every client i try i get error!
channel.description: I can compile, run my server but i can't run a client since i updated my java that they said i should use on a guide. What should i do with a 508 server if the client don't work? Help please!

item.title: Every client i try i get error!
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

if you have to restart everything then its not saving your game. open your source and look for a folder called “savedgames” or something like that. if nothing is in the folder then your path is not correct. open the Source’s file “SaveGameHandler.java” and search for
" try {
ObjectInputStream in = new ObjectInputStream(
new FileInputStream("./savedGames/" + playerName + “.dat”))"
the file ("./savedGames/" + playerName + ".dat)) is saying the folder is called savedGames and it’s saving all characters as a .dat file. if you do not have a savedGames file then change the path or create a file called “savedGames”

Read full topic
item.source: Every client i try i get error!

item.title: Every client i try i get error!
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

if none of that works … then maybe ur INTERNET SECURITY has something to do with it

like i have kapersky security on my computer … it blocked me from going on any server
then my dad activated some thing on it and it worked

item.title: Every client i try i get error!
item.dc:creator: @masterkorv12 masterkorv12
item.description:
@masterkorv12 wrote:

the client and run work but when i change something in my 508 server and compiles when i play server again i have to start over everything i done with codes and the last place i visited… why does this happens when i compile and it says it compiled when i had set myself admin and logged in i wasn’t admin? wtf help!

item.title: Every client i try i get error!
item.dc:creator: @Becoming Becoming
item.description:
@Becoming wrote:

Try changing your client? - if not then reset the java settings and do a system restore , back to a date when you had no updated java.
